name: unwearable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If clothes are unwearable, people choose not to wear them because they are uncomfortable or damaged, or because they do not look attractive: That dress looks stunning but it is completely unwearable. The jacket had a large yellow stain that rendered it unwearable. Opposite
wearable
More examplesFewer examplesThe clothes that appear in fashion magazines are often unwearable.My gloves had been chewed by my daughter's dog and were now completely unwearable.She has a flair for taking old, virtually unwearable clothes and transforming them into things of beauty.
